item.title: Synchro Eldlich in 2021! Combos & Deck Profiles!
item.content:encoded: An in-depth look at what Synchro Eldlich looks like in 2021 post Jet Synchron/O-Lion/Linkross ban. The deck still has a decent amount of consistency and can end on some pretty oppressive boards if allowed. We'll break down the deck and how it functions, some of the combos you can go into depending on the type of board you're trying to put out, monsters you can implement, and the overall deck profile itself. Click the link below for the full video!

item.title: TRPFRD Episode 2: Hand Traps & Floodgates
item.content:encoded:
In this episode we discuss the prevalence of floodgates and hand traps in the current meta, their effectiveness and competitiveness in the current game-state, what decks are affected, and how you can best implement those cards into your strategy. We also take a dive into format's past and check out and debate the most powerful decks of the last five years!
Note: This episode is broken into two parts due to the extensive amount covered in our hand traps and floodgates section of this episode's podcast.

item.title: TRPFRD Episode 1: New Dark Magician Support
item.content:encoded: In this episode we discuss some of the latest cards that have fallen or risen in price over the last few weeks with our market watch segment, taking a look at cards ranging from Nightmare Corrupter Iblee to Dark Magician of Chaos, we discuss the new Dark Magician support that recently got released in the Battle of Chaos Box, looking at new combos, strategies, and where the deck falls in terms of competitiveness in the current format. We take a deep dive in on whether Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon is starting to pose a problem in the current TCG and who's really the problem throughout the engine, while also discussing some of the top decks and ones to watch going into the September-October format and which decks among those are best suited for the upcoming meta.
